content:
You can now encrypt the Comments field on the Individual Application Task Participant object. This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions where Grantmaking is enabled. It's available to customers who purchased Salesforce Shield or Shield Platform Encryption add-on subscriptions.

On the Encryption Settings page, click Select Fields. Then click Edit, and select the Comments field of the Individual Application Task Participant object. You can encrypt the Comments field with the probabilistic, case-sensitive deterministic, or case-insensitive deterministic encryption schemes.
title: Grantmaking Compliant Data Sharing Comments Encryption in Salesforce
